text: John Langdon Haydon Down (18 November 1828 â€“ 7 October 1896) was a British physician. He was best known for his description of the genetic condition now known as Down syndrome, which he originally discovered in 1862. ==References== ==Other websites== * Langdon Down Centre, Normansfield, Middlesex * Londonist Discovers Normansfield Hospital Entertainment Hall Category:1828 births Category:1896 deaths Category:People from Cornwall Category:English physicians
